website_summaries.verdict: The perfect way for beginners to produce a fast, professional-looking cat eye.
pros: The hard angled tip is an easy way for beginners to trace and fill in a simple cat eye
A truly waterproof liner, it withstands sweat, tears, and heavy rain
The smudge-resistant formula still looks perfect even after a nap
Color glides on easily with very little pressure
cons: The hard tip takes some getting used to and may be uncomfortable at first

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy - totally different than the sample
customer_reviews.text: I got a free sample of this eyeliner last summer. I loved it! It’s easy to apply, the color is bold and doesn’t smudge. I am almost out of it, and I was happy that it was available on Amazon. I paid 26.00 for full size and it isn’t the same. The applicator brush is different and it doesn’t go on as nicely because it’s too big and chunky. Cannot draw a fine line with it. The color looks like a washed out magic marker brown and it smudges. 🙁 I’m not happy with it at all. See attached photo- small sample and product received.
customer_reviews.author: chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your money!
customer_reviews.text: Yes it's easy to use, especially since I hit my 50's and my eyes lids are starting to sag. ugh. IT IS NOT WATER PROOF. Don't waste your money. I put it on fairly easy but in an hour I could just wipe it off. I put it on in the morning wore it all day at home and it was smudged all over.Good thing I don't work.
customer_reviews.author: Kandi G.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Unprofessionally not wrapped not safe and definitely the box came open.. I’m sure the real cat van do you would not except that for businesswise I hope is waterproof
customer_reviews.author: A.C.

customer_reviews.title: No Real. Not Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof at all! Not sure if it was real produc!
customer_reviews.author: JOHNDOLLY

customer_reviews.title: Best Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this eyeliner!! She loves to do eye makeup and this is her favorite liner
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, precise liner. Last all day and easy to remove
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eyeliner! I got a sample of this awhile back and immediately made it my standard for daily wear. The applicator is precise and goes on easy without tugging on my lid, leaving an even line. The sample last for a couple of months and hoping this larger model will go for at least 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jaloha73

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Best most precise eyeliner ever. Long wearing and easy to apply
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and can use with contacts will not irratate you
customer_reviews.text: Best eye liner in the world only one I use and lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Those are nice and neat
customer_reviews.text: I like that it stays on and does not smudge yet it is not hard to remove.
customer_reviews.author: ANA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eyeliner! It lasts through a sweaty run, paddleboarding, and crying but easily washes off. It doesn’t irritate my eyes like other products
customer_reviews.author: Marcella

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, do not have to re-apply during the day!
customer_reviews.text: Love the longevity! My eyes tear quite a bit and this product does not smudge all day! I have not had to re-apply even once... and I use tissue and facial cream to easily wipe off before bed. Perfect! Buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did they change the formula?
customer_reviews.text: This used to be my favorite liner. But idk if they changed the formula but it's not even worth the energy to apply it. It wears off in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Pessaro

customer_reviews.title: Held up to a funeral
customer_reviews.text: Best liquid liner ive used. I have sensitive eyes, no issues. I first got this for my father’s funeral- worked well . Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mollie O

customer_reviews.title: Nice product & stays in place
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this couple times and really like how it goes on & stays in place. Easy to remove
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Harms

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dried out
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure it would have worked how it was supposed to if it hadn’t arrived dried out. Was very skippy and clumpy and did not go smooth at all.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: WATERPROOF 💦
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product stays on all day but easy to remove! I normally don't pay this much for eye makeup. It is definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kara C.

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Love his eyeliner. It is easy to apply and it stays on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Yauchler

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the application tip
customer_reviews.text: I personally hated this eyeliner not the eyeliner itself the formula is great and it lasts all day but the application tip I thought would be nice for the way I do my eyeliner but I was wrong. The angled brush tip is very picky and I used it lightly and the tip fanned out a bit and I lost that precision line. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: Great eyeliner; it is easy to apply, the color is rich, last all day and doesn’t smudge. Although I heard from my 17yo daughter the designer is an anti-vaccer so might not re-order.
customer_reviews.author: Flamingo39

customer_reviews.title: Beveled end
customer_reviews.text: I really liked you small version of this. It has a small thin brush. This brush doesn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Faia

customer_reviews.title: No thank you
customer_reviews.text: Did not resist against water as advertised. Difficult to apply as tip is too thick.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Shirley

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This was not waterproof. The application brush got bent and it only works if you hold upright. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: kjuice

customer_reviews.title: I rate this a 10 Plus!
customer_reviews.text: Best eyeliner I have ever used! Does not smudge or run!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Guess

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is garbage the eye liner has no ink whatsoever this is ridiculous and a joke to the customer for 24 dollars spent on this product I received it yesterday and went to use it today for the first time and it has no ink has you can see in my hand
customer_reviews.author: SpiritsGuidance222

customer_reviews.title: Long wear.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have oily skin and can keep eyeliner on to save my life (even with primer!) but this stuff stays really, really well. Easy to use, perfect color. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Dry product, the worst
customer_reviews.text: the product came open in its box and without the lid, it is dry and obviously not working
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Love this eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner!! Goes on thick or thin and is very easy to apply. This eyeliner lasts so long too.
customer_reviews.author: Donna H

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I wear under my work scrubs. Wash and wears nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Bamagirl

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Brand new this thing is still unbelievably dry. Total rip off, even from high end stores including the KVD website. It catches and looks choppy, virtually impossible to get a smooth application. I would sooner recommend you save your money and go to Walmart and find something better. More expensive does not always mean better, especially in this case.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: not worth it for monolids
customer_reviews.text: it's highly pigmented, takes a few trial strokes before the formula doesn't come out watery. It's a bit tacky/sticky, so reapplying is usually lumpy/flaky esp if you have monolids. But it drys fast and seems fairly durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Peabody

product_meta.title: Kat Von D Dagger Tattoo Liner Waterproof Liquid Eyeliner Trooper Black
